items.title: Painting with SVG
items.content:
SVG's a great format for creating illustrative graphics on the web, but it can sometimes feel a bit... flat?

Illustration in the real-world is gloriously messy. It's full of texture, human error, smudges, and paint splatters. Let's take a look at how we can use different SVG techniques to recreate some of this tactile 'messiness'

items.title: Getting started with SVG animation
items.content:
Have you wanted to give SVG animation a go but havenâ€™t found the time or known where to start?

Animation is one of the best ways to bring brand personality and character to an online experience, but in the busy world of front-end development, it can often be overlooked.

Join me for a day of SVG animation fun!

items.title: Interactive web animation with SVG
items.content: Have you ever felt uninspired by the every-day grind? Like coding is all work and no play? Come with me as I take you on a whistle-stop tour of delightful SVG animations.

items.title: Limitation breeds creativity
items.content: Constraints might not feel like what you want when you're trying to kickstart creativity or start a new project. But working within constraints can help you get started and provide unconventional ways around a problem.
